item.title: 《商报》报道：宝马正与欧盟就"中国制造"迷你车的关税豁免进行谈判
item.description: 据德国《商报》周二报道，宝马公司与欧盟委员会正就一项可能的最低定价模式进行磋商，该模式或将取代欧盟对这家德国汽车制造商在中国生产的迷你电动汽车征收的关税。【原文：BMW and the European Commission are in talks about a possible minimum pricing model that could replace EU tariffs on the German carmaker's Chinese-made Mini electric vehicles, Germany's Handelsblatt business daily reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 劳氏公司预测全年销售额将下滑，因消费者推迟大额家居翻新项目
item.description: 劳氏公司周三公布的年度销售额和利润预测低于华尔街预期，因经济不确定性加剧及借贷成本上升，更多美国人推迟大额家居装修项目并缩减DIY支出。【原文：Lowe's Cos forecast annual sales and profit below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as more Americans delay big-ticket home renovations and rein in do-it-yourself spending amid economic uncertainty and elevated borrowing costs.】

item.title: 女子因社交媒体成瘾起诉Meta和YouTube，现于庭审中出庭作证
item.description: 一名加州女子将于周三出庭作证，讲述童年时期使用Meta平台的Instagram和谷歌的YouTube如何影响了她的心理健康。这场具有里程碑意义的审判正在洛杉矶持续进行。【原文：A California woman is set to testify in court on Wednesday about how using Meta Platforms' Instagram and Google's YouTube as a child affected her mental health, as her landmark trial in Los Angeles continues.】

item.title: OpenAI封禁加拿大校园枪击案凶手账号引发对其其他网络活动的审查
item.description: OpenAI承认在18岁枪手杰西·范·鲁特塞拉尔杀害八人并自杀数月前，就已封禁其ChatGPT账户。这一披露引发了对其过往网络活动的更多关注，并引发质疑：是否错失了阻止加拿大史上最严重大规模枪击案的机会。【原文：OpenAI's admission it banned the ChatGPT account of mass shooter Jesse Van Rootselaar months before the 18-year-old killed eight people and herself is drawing more scrutiny to her past online activity and raising questions about whether opportunities were missed to prevent one of Canada's worst-ever mass killings.】

item.title: 谷歌捣毁了与中国有关联的黑客组织，该组织曾攻击全球53个团体
item.description: 谷歌周三表示，该公司已瓦解一个与中国有关联的黑客组织，该组织曾入侵42个国家至少53家机构。【原文：Google disrupted a Chinese-linked hacking group that breached at least 53 organizations across 42 countries, the company said Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家：美国下令外交官抵制数据主权倡议
item.description: 一份内部外交电报称，此类举措可能干扰人工智能相关服务。【原文：An internal diplomatic cable said such efforts could interfere with AI-related services.】

item.title: 期权交易者对英伟达财报发布后最小幅度的波动进行定价
item.description: 尽管投资者希望这家芯片制造商的财报能为人工智能行业前景提供指引，但股票期权市场的交易员们对英伟达季度业绩可能对股价产生的影响表现得异常谨慎。【原文：Traders in the equity options market are unusually subdued about how much Nvidia's quarterly results might move the stock, even as investors hope the chipmaker's earnings report will shed light on the outlook for the artificial-intelligence trade.】

item.title: 摇摇欲坠的美国科技贸易为市场踩下刹车，英伟达测试临近
item.description: 科技股交易在2026年开局不利，这源于对人工智能颠覆性冲击的担忧以及滞后板块的吸引力，但若没有这个重量级板块的助力，大盘恐难实现显著涨幅。【原文：The technology stock trade has stumbled out of the starting block in 2026, stemming from pressure from artificial intelligence disruption fears and the allure of groups that have lagged, but the broader market may struggle to make substantial gains without the heavyweight sector's help.】

item.title: 中国表示已履行对美贸易义务，警告勿加征关税
item.description: 中国周三表示，已履行与美国《301条款》不公平贸易行为相关的义务。此前美国贸易代表表示将持续开展可能导致加征关税的调查。【原文：China said on Wednesday it had already met obligations linked to Washington's Section 301 unfair trade practices statute, after the U.S. Trade Representative signalled he would continue investigations that could lead to more tariffs.】

item.title: 美国股市期货小幅上涨，英伟达财报前夕人工智能担忧情绪缓解
item.description: 周三美国股指期货小幅走高，在经历本周早些时段的剧烈波动后趋于平稳。投资者正评估人工智能板块面临的风险以及关税疑云加剧的影响，同时等待英伟达稍晚公布的财报。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were slightly higher on Wednesday, stabilizing after volatile sessions earlier this week as investors assessed risks to the AI trade and brewing tariff doubts heading into Nvidia's earnings due later in the day.】

item.title: ASML在2025年年度报告中将人工智能需求视为长期增长动力
item.description: 全球最大的芯片光刻设备供应商ASML在周三发布的2025年年度报告中表示，当前人工智能热潮已成为推动其产品需求的主要动力。【原文：ASML , the biggest supplier of lithography equipment used to make computer chips, said in its 2025 annual report published Wednesday it now sees the artificial intelligence boom as the main driver for demand for its products.】

item.title: 运动品牌On在韩国开设机器人工厂以应对供应链风险
item.description: 运动品牌On Running周三宣布，已在韩国釜山开设工厂，利用机器人生产跑鞋，并计划在美国和欧洲增设更多机器人工厂，以加快生产和交付速度。【原文：Sportswear brand On Running has opened a factory in Busan, South Korea using robots to make running shoes and plans more robot factories in the United States and Europe as it tries to speed up manufacturing and delivery, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: SK海力士将在韩国投资150亿美元建设新半导体工厂
item.description: 韩国SK海力士周三宣布，计划投资21.6万亿韩元（约合150.7亿美元），在2030年前于韩国龙仁市新建芯片生产线，以满足不断增长的半导体需求。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix said on Wednesday that it plans to invest 21.6 trillion won ($15.07 billion) to build new chip production lines in the South Korean city of Yongin by 2030 to meet rising demand for semiconductors.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长称当前政策判断难度加大，呼吁保持耐心
item.description: 澳大利亚央行一位高层官员周三表示，鉴于经济已接近平衡状态，且通胀率虽高但尚未再度攀升，当前政策判断更为困难。【原文：A top Australian central banker said on Wednesday that policy judgments were more difficult now given the economy was close to balance and inflation was high but not taking off again.】

item.title: 塔斯社报道，俄罗斯因谷歌分发VPN服务对其处以罚款
item.description: 俄罗斯一家法院因谷歌在应用商店Google Play上提供VPN（虚拟专用网络）服务，对其处以逾2200万卢布（约合28.8万美元）的罚款，俄罗斯塔斯社周三报道。【原文：A Russian court has fined Alphabet's Google over 22 million roubles ($288,000) for distributing VPN (virtual private network) services on the Google Play app store, state news agency TASS reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Workday股价暴跌，因人工智能威胁下营收前景黯淡
item.description: 周三盘前，企业软件制造商Workday股价下跌约10%，此前该公司因宏观经济不确定性加剧导致企业缩减开支，而下调了营收预期。【原文：Workday shares fell about 10% premarket on Wednesday after the enterprise software maker forecast downbeat revenue as corporations pull back on spending amid broader macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 交易商称，印度尼西亚可能难以兑现对美国农产品进口的新承诺
item.description: 交易商表示，印度尼西亚可能难以兑现其在新贸易协议下大幅增加美国农产品进口的承诺，而大幅增加美国豆粕采购的重担将落在新成立的负责购买动物饲料的国家机构身上。【原文：Indonesia could struggle to meet its pledge for a significant ramp-up of U.S. agricultural imports under its new trade deal, traders said, with the burden of vastly increasing U.S. soymeal purchases falling on a state agency newly tasked to buy animal feed.】

item.title: 京东创始人推出游艇品牌
item.description: 中国电商巨头京东创始人刘强东近日推出独立游艇品牌"海拓"，致力于打造"100%绿色"游艇，让普通家庭也能负担得起。【原文：The founder of Chinese e-commerce giant JD.com , Richard Liu, has launched an independent yacht brand, Sea Expandary, aiming to build "100% green" yachts that will be affordable for ordinary households.】

item.title: 小米就专利使用费关税问题向印度税务部门提出质疑，此案备受关注
item.description: 据法律文件显示，小米公司已对印度税务部门的一项裁决提出异议。该裁决认定小米在专利使用费支付中逃避了7200万美元关税。这家中国公司及其律师表示，此案是对印度合同制造法律框架的一次考验。【原文：Xiaomi has challenged an Indian tax ruling that said the company evaded $72 million in tariffs on royalty payments, according to legal documents, a dispute that the Chinese company and lawyers say is a test of the country's legal framework for contract manufacturing.】

item.title: 独家：高盛集团拟向字节跳动出售股份，估值达5500亿美元
item.description: 知情人士透露，投资公司General Atlantic正出售其持有的字节跳动股权，该交易对这家中国社交媒体巨头的估值达5500亿美元，标志着这家私营企业的股价大幅上涨。【原文：Investment firm General Atlantic is selling an equity stake in ByteDance in a deal that values the Chinese social media giant at $550 billion, two people with knowledge of the matter said, marking a dramatic rise in the privately held shares.】

item.title: 日经报道：微软日本因涉嫌违反反垄断法遭突击搜查
item.description: 日本公平交易委员会周三突击搜查了微软日本公司办公室，作为调查其是否不当限制Azure平台客户使用竞争对手云服务的一部分。日本经济新闻援引知情人士消息报道了此事。【原文：Japan's Fair Trade Commission raided Microsoft Japan's offices on Wednesday as part of an investigation into whether it improperly restricted customers of its Azure platform from using rival cloud services, the Nikkei business daily reported, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，宝马将召回近5.9万辆存在线束损坏问题的汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，宝马因空调系统线束可能受损导致短路，将在美国召回58,713辆汽车。【原文：BMW is recalling 58,713 vehicles in the U.S. due to a wiring harness for the air conditioning system that may be damaged and cause a short circuit, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 字节跳动旗下AI聊天机器人豆包在春节期间以1亿用户量赢得中国假日争夺战
item.description: 字节跳动的聊天机器人豆包在春节期间日活跃用户突破一亿，在一场人工智能大战中胜出。据私营机构调查显示，中国最大科技公司为获取新用户投入了数十亿资金。【原文：ByteDance's Doubao chatbot attracted over 100 million daily active users during China's Lunar New Year holiday, winning an AI battle that saw the country's largest tech companies spend billions to acquire new users, a private survey showed.】

item.title: 印度塔塔咨询服务公司首席执行官称，尽管存在营收风险，仍敦促员工使用人工智能技术
item.description: 印度最大软件服务供应商塔塔咨询服务公司首席执行官周三表示，该公司正敦促员工使用人工智能工具来更快、更便宜地完成工作，即使这会侵蚀公司收入。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services is urging employees to use artificial intelligence tools to deliver work faster and cheaper, even if it eats into the company's revenue, the CEO of India's largest software-services provider said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计2026年底金价将达每盎司6300美元
item.description: 摩根大通周三在一份报告中表示，预计今年央行和投资者的需求将最终推动金价在2026年底前升至每盎司6300美元。【原文：JP Morgan sees demand from central banks and investors this year ultimately pushing gold prices to $6,300 an ounce by end-2026, JP Morgan said in a note on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿斯顿·马丁裁员20%，因美国关税冲击
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿·马丁周三宣布，将裁减多达20%的员工，以努力摆脱美国进口关税和中国需求疲软的影响。【原文：British luxury car maker Aston Martin will cut its workforce by up to 20%, it said on Wednesday, as it strives to recover from the impact of U.S. import tariffs and weak demand in China.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行在达成美英交易后，目标2028年实现逾200亿欧元利润
item.description: 西班牙最大银行桑坦德银行周三表示，计划到2028年将利润提升至200亿欧元以上。该行将依托美国和英国市场的增长、客户数量的增加以及信息技术转型的成本节约来实现这一目标。【原文：Santander aims to boost its profit to more than 20 billion euros by 2028, helped by growth in its U.S. and UK markets, a rise in customer numbers and cost savings from its IT transformation, Spain's number one bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧再次下调业绩预期，削减股息，因中美需求疲软
item.description: 帝亚吉欧在四个月内第二次下调年度销售额和利润预期，并大幅削减股息。这家全球最大烈酒生产商在新任首席执行官戴夫·刘易斯领导下的首份财报显示，美国和中国市场需求疲软仍在拖累其业绩。【原文：Diageo cut its annual sales and profit forecast for the second time in four months and slashed its dividend, as its first results under new boss Dave Lewis showed weak U.S. and Chinese demand still weighing on the world's biggest spirits maker.】

item.title: OPmobility报告2025年利润率增长，确认布雷尔担任首席执行官
item.description: OPmobility周三公布了2025年利润增长预期，并正式任命菲莉西·布雷尔为首席执行官。这家法国汽车零部件供应商正持续推进多元化战略。【原文：OPmobility on Wednesday reported 2025 margin growth and confirmed Félicie Burelle as its chief executive officer as the French car parts supplier continues to pursue a diversification strategy.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：亚洲科技股吹起人工智能泡沫
item.description: 韦恩·科尔为您解析欧洲及全球市场今日展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】
